name: vbox_mcp
description: MCP server for managing VirtualBox virtual machines with Windows Sandbox, Hyper-V, and security analysis capabilities

prompts.name: list_vms_prompt
prompts.description: List all available VirtualBox virtual machines
prompts.text: List all available VirtualBox virtual machines

prompts.name: start_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Start a specific VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.text: Start the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: stop_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Stop a running VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.text: Stop the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: create_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Create a new VirtualBox virtual machine
prompts.text: Create a new VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name} with {ram_gb}GB RAM and {disk_gb}GB disk

prompts.name: delete_vm_prompt
prompts.text: Delete the VirtualBox virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: create_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Create a snapshot of a virtual machine
prompts.text: Create a snapshot named {snapshot_name} of the virtual machine {vm_name} with description '{description}'

prompts.name: restore_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Restore a virtual machine to a previous snapshot
prompts.text: Restore the virtual machine {vm_name} to the snapshot named {snapshot_name}

prompts.name: list_snapshots_prompt
prompts.description: List all snapshots for a virtual machine
prompts.text: List all snapshots for the virtual machine named {vm_name}

prompts.name: delete_snapshot_prompt
prompts.description: Delete a snapshot from a virtual machine
prompts.text: Delete the snapshot named {snapshot_name} from the virtual machine {vm_name}

prompts.name: set_network_adapter_prompt
prompts.description: Configure network adapter settings for a virtual machine
prompts.text: Set the network adapter {adapter_number} of virtual machine {vm_name} to {network_mode} with {additional_params}

prompts.name: attach_iso_prompt
prompts.description: Attach an ISO file to a virtual machine
prompts.text: Attach the ISO file at {iso_path} to the virtual machine {vm_name}

prompts.name: modify_vm_prompt
prompts.text: Modify the virtual machine {vm_name} with the following settings: {settings}

prompts.name: clone_vm_prompt
prompts.text: Create a clone named {new_vm_name} from the virtual machine {source_vm_name} with {options}

prompts.name: export_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Export a virtual machine to an OVA/OVF file
prompts.text: Export the virtual machine {vm_name} to {output_file} with {options}

prompts.name: import_vm_prompt
prompts.description: Import a virtual machine from an OVA/OVF file
prompts.text: Import a virtual machine from {input_file} with name {vm_name} and {options}
